thread.title: Brenda Bradshaw
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Brenda Bradshaw

author: Brenda Bradshaw
title: Brenda Bradshaw
text: gentleman th a came to fix our to let was very nice an knowable of the work that needed to be done and saved me $380.00o We had called a plumber the first time and he did not fix it,was not nice or processional. Like I said we love choice. Home warranty is our go-to for anything that needs to be fixed.
